column1: Multiplication questions
If a box contains 10 pencils and there are 6 boxes, how many pencils are there in total?
A pizza place makes 8 pizzas and each pizza has 6 slices. How many slices of pizza did they make in total?
There are 7 days in a week and each day has 24 hours. How many hours are in a week?
A bag has 12 marbles and there are 4 bags. How many marbles are there in total?
If a bookshelf has 5 shelves and there are 10 books on each shelf, how many books are on the bookshelf in total?
A classroom has 30 desks and each desk has 2 chairs. How many chairs are in the classroom?
There are 6 balls in a pack and there are 8 packs. How many balls are there in total?
A box contains 4 toy cars and there are 15 boxes. How many toy cars are there in total?
If a store sells 5 boxes of candy and each box has 10 pieces of candy, how many pieces of candy are sold in total?
A garden has 8 rows and each row has 7 flowers. How many flowers are in the garden?
If a movie theater has 9 rows of seats and each row has 12 seats, how many seats are in the theater?
A package has 20 stickers and there are 6 packages. How many stickers are there in total?
There are 10 apples in a bag and there are 9 bags. How many apples are there in total?
If a bakery makes 4 cakes and each cake has 8 slices, how many slices of cake are there in total?
A toy store has 12 dolls and there are 7 toy stores. How many dolls are there in total?
If a farm has 5 cows and each cow has 4 legs, how many legs do the cows have in total?
A pack has 3 pens and there are 20 packs. How many pens are there in total?
A box has 9 crayons and there are 11 boxes. How many crayons are there in total?
A book has 12 chapters and there are 5 books. How many chapters are there in total?
If a zoo has 4 elephants and each elephant weighs 5000 pounds, how many pounds do the elephants weigh in total?
